dataset.title: A revision of the Australian species of the genus Melobasis Laporte & Gory 1837 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae), Part 3 (Revision of the azureipennis, cupricollis, iridicolor and melanura species groups)

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Levey, Brian (2023): A revision of the Australian species of the genus Melobasis Laporte & Gory 1837 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae), Part 3 (Revision of the azureipennis, cupricollis, iridicolor and melanura species groups). Zootaxa 5302 (1): 1-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5302.1.1, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.1094/PDIS-04-22-0755-PDN

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Levey B, plazi (2023). A revision of the Australian species of the genus Melobasis Laporte & Gory 1837 (Coleoptera: Buprestidae), Part 3 (Revision of the azureipennis, cupricollis, iridicolor and melanura species groups). Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/zg3sdf accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.
